Title: Cancer Center
Description1: A medical team made up of specialists from many different fields and medical professionals with expertise in cancer
Description3: -Offers precision in diagnosis and treatment of all cancers

Title: Joint Replacement Center
Description1: Using the latest advanced surgical technology to treat Complex joint problems
Description2: -Provides rehabilitation and pain management to provide faster recovery for patients

Title: Heart (Cardiology) Center
Description1: Employs comprehensive and holistic approaches to heart health
Description2: -Treats over 3,000 cardiac cases a month, of which approximately 1,000 are non-invasive procedures
Description3: -Verified to be at or above international standards for diagnosing and treating cardiac conditions

Title: Spine Institute
Description2: -Uses the latest advanced technology in both surgical and non-surgical procedures
Description3: -Has a team of  top experts and spine specialists

Title: Orthopedic Center
Description1: State-of-the-art diagnostic, non-invasive, non-surgical and surgical orthopedic services
Description2: -Offers a complete range of diagnostic, therapeutic and surgical orthopedic services
Description3: -Dedicated team of experts in surgical and medical orthopedics

Title: Nephrology (Kidney) Center
Description1: Has a team of locally accredited nephrologists working closely with nutritionists, pharmacists and clinical nurse coordinators
Description2: -Offers pharmaceutical care for kidney disease patients who usually take several medications together
Description3: -Uses the latest advanced technology in both diagnostics and treatment procedures

Title: Liver Center
Description1: Uses the latest medical technology and equipment to deliver the best care for all patients in the Liver Center
Description2: -Provides a complete range of services that include diagnosis, treatment and follow-up for patients with liver and bile duct disorders

Title: Digestive Disease (GI) Center
Description1: A multidisciplinary team that treats abnormalities of the gastrointestinal tract
Description2: -Has a team of experts with years of experience treating many kinds of digestive diseases
Description3: -State-of-the-art laboratory and pathology facilities which result in quick lab tests and shorter waiting times between appointments and treatment
